content: Collin Dougherty is a senior undergraduate at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying mathematics and psychology. He is particularly interested in how data can be used in a wide variety of fields, including sports analytics, trading, and surveys. He worked in the field of sports analytics with the University of Nebraska. Learn more about Collin here.
summary: Collin Dougherty is a senior undergraduate at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying mathematics and psychology. He is particularly interested in how data can be used in a wide variety of fields, including sports analytics, trading, and surveys.
title: Collin Dougherty
